solution.text:
Portion of book read in _{j}_ hours = \( \frac 13 \)
Thus, portion of book read in 1 hour = \( \frac 13 \div _{j}_ = _{{Fraction(1,3*j)}}_\) [Unitary Method]
Time limit given = \( 2 \frac 15 = \frac {11}5 \) hours [Converting into an improper fraction]
Thus, portion of book read in \(\frac {11}5 \) hours if \(_{{Fraction(1,3*j)}}_\) of it is read in an hour =\( _{{Fraction(1,3*j)}}_ \times \frac {11}5 \)
= \(_{{Fraction(11,15*j)}}_\)

content.text: Raghav reads \( \frac 13^{rd}\) of a certain book in _{j}_ hours. How much of the book will he be able to read in \( 2 \frac 15\) hours? (Please provide your answer in the form of a simplified fraction)
